nodes.text: Altikar IV was a planet in the Altikar system.

During the Galactic Civil War Altikar IV became the home to the Human Jedi Jhor-Kai. Through the Force, he appeared in the dreams of a Twi'lek Force-sensitive named Sha'lia. She eventually escaped from her owner and traveled to the planet with the aid of fellow escapee Goort. On the planet, Jhor-Kai trained Sha'lia in the Force, and Goort in starship piloting. After a short time, however, Imperials tracked the Jedi to the planet and attacked. Jhor-Kai was killed by stormtroopers buying time for his students to escape the planet.
The planet Altikar IV was created for the Wizards of the Coast roleplaying game Child of Light saga scenario, Child of Light, published in 2000. Its system was mentioned in The Essential Atlas.
